Twister/Blizzard


*Twister looks at what was left of the base*

Twister: I=
 always be nothing but a failer with nowhere to go...

*Twister walks next =
to the pieces of the base sits down staring at the ground*


*Blizzard frow=
ns and a mech tear runs out of her optic*

Blizzard: I'll never have a plac=
e to stay that I can actually call home.....

*Blizzard lowers her head and=
 sighs*

  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: THECODE 
  To: nbwrpg@egro=
ups.com 
  Sent: Saturday, August 05, 2000 3:10 AM
  Subject: The End is Ne=
ar...........


  Dracona looked into the pit. Plintissa wasn't moving. Dra=
cona smiled and walked back toward her base. A dagger flew into Dracona's b=
ack. She spun around and grabbed the dagger in pain. Plintissa stood there.=


  "You do not know when to give up, you fool, but never mind that your an=
 idiot, I'm going to grind you so small you won't be able to be seen with a=
 microscope!" Dracona said. She kept her hand covered and flung the dagger =
back. It missed Plintissa and hit Artist in the leg. Dracona smiled in sati=
sfaction. Plintissa tackled Dacona and took her down. Dracona once again tu=
rned to her saw blade to saw into Plintissa. Dracona fired an ice beam, but=
 Plintissa dodged. Dracona started to burn everything with fire beams. Plin=
tissa still avoids it. Plintissa was always a good fighter, but it wasn't u=
ntil now, after her bad life that she discovered her true fighting power. P=
lintissa beat Dracona mercilessly. Draocona's parts were flung everywhere a=
s Plintissa spun a simple stick through the air. Dracona raised the saw bla=
de and sliced the stick to pieces. Dracona laughed and sliced Plintissa sev=
eral hundred times. Plintissa fell.

  "Th weak move aside and die so the s=
trong can survive. As ancient as the Cosmos, that has always been the way o=
f things. I'm sorry Plintissa, you were a good friend, but don't take this =
personally, it's just business." Dracona said.
   
  Dracona pulled back th=
e saw blade and thrust it towards Plintissa. Plintissa grabbed her arm from=
 earlier and threw it. It hit Dracona's blade. Dracona slammed it into Plin=
tissa, but as she did, the blade came loose before it hit Plintissa. The bl=
ade flew up. Dracona blinked her eye, the one Dinobot had scarred when she =
first arived on the planet. The blade sawed through Dracona and left her in=
 pieces everywhere. Her spark extinguished. Her last words were:

  "*Cough=
, Cough* Zardus I am sorry. Plintissa, do not forget your promise." And Dra=
cona died smiling. Plintissa remembered that she promised Dracona that she =
would never leave her sitting. Plintissa cried. Her mech fluid ran everywhe=
re and she got weaker and weaker. Artist stepped slowly over to Plintissa. =
He was crying, too.

  "Artist, I'm sorry it had to end this way." Plintiss=
a whispered.

  "Why are you leaving me, Plintissa? Why does everyone betra=
y me?" Artist asked.

  "Artist, there floats Dracona's spark, recover it, =
we can't part, she really was my friend." Artist walked up and captured the=
 extinguished spark as it tried to fly away. He contained it in a capsule.
=

  "Plintissa, if you leave me, I'll...have no more reason to live, all my =
friends are gone, my helping days are over." Artist said.

  "Your helping =
days are never over, and we'll always be together." Plintissa said.

  "Thi=
s isn't some lame thing about how you'll always be in my heart, is it?"

  =
"No, Artist, come here." Plintissa whispered. Artist looked at Team Ultima'=
s base. It was destroyed, the funny thing was, that it was destroyed by Dra=
cona, the very one, along with Plintissa, that originally built it. And the=
re it was, sticking above ground now and burning away. Sinesis looks at the=
 base and sighs.

  "Twister, Dracona is dead, I guess we have to leave." S=
inesis says. Sinister stands next to Blizzard and sighs.

  "Blizzard, we n=
eed to find another home, now." Sinister said sadly.

  Artist came closer =
to Plintissa. Her spark suddenly burst from her and floated into Artist's h=
ands. She said to him what he needed to do. He opened his chest compartment=
 and his spark was revealed. Artist combined Plintissa's spark with his own=
, they became one.

  "Till all are one." Artist whispered really low. Plin=
tissa told him she still loved him. Artist was overjoyed! Plintissa was wit=
h him now, and now they could never be seperated again. Artist, completely =
ignoring Blizzard and Sinister, and Sinesis and Twister. ran out into a fie=
ld.

  "Artist, now we need to take care of Dracona's spark." Plintissa sai=
d. (Remember, only Artist can hear Plintissa now) Artist headed toward the =
Maximal base, there Dracona would get a new body, one she could not attack =
anyone ever again in, and where she can always be helpful. Artist held up t=
he contained, Dracona's spark still inside.

  "I love you." Artist said se=
emingly to nobody.

  "I love you too." Plintissa said to Artist. Artist co=
ntinued walking to the Maximal base...
